channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:
Lorry has snapped tree branch, requires cutting and taking away.

item.title: Dead animal by entrance to flats 82-96 Grovelands Rd, 18th September
item.description:
I have reported the issue already, and apparently was difficult to find it. Please check the photos, you can not missed it. Also that bin ,with Falcone close on it, has been full for months. Can someone sort this out ASAP, the smell is getting very unpleasant, but also flies, worms.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grovelands Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass Cutting, 18th September
item.description:
Grass verge outside the maisonettes for Thayers Farm Road has not been cut and the areas that have been cut have not had the cut grass cleared.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thayers Farm Road, New Beckenham, London

item.title: Leaning pole, 18th September
item.description:
The pole for this road sign was damaged during the Carnival. It is now leaning at a noticeable angle, and might become unsafe/ fall.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Northumberland Place, Bayswater, London

item.title: Illegal and inconsiderate parking, 18th September
item.description:
Yet again, 2:45pm and the drivers begin to congregate outside Coopers School, ignoring double yellow lines and yellow sign parking restrictions and park across junctions. Where are the Traffic Wardens or Police to fine them and discourage this behaviour?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hawkwood Lane, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cans and bottles, 18th September
item.description:
Discarded cans and bottles which have never been cleared up. Constantly a problem.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): William Foster Lane, Welling, London

item.title: Overflowing Waste Bin., 18th September
item.description:
This particular bin hasn’t been emptied for 2-3 weeks and is full. It is positioned with the recycling bins so perhaps is being missed by the household waste trucks. Should it be moved elsewhere?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Colville Estate, Hackney, London

item.title: Burnout van obstructinf access, 18th September
item.description:
Urgent burnt out van obstructing access for wheelchair user, can't get out of house as vehicle in the way. Please urgently remove

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 163, Star Lane, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Parking on corners and double yellows, 18th September
item.description:
Parents collecting and dropping off their children park across the corners, every school day on double yellow lines. Children cannot cross safely and other drivers cannot see when leaving the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bark Burr Road, Grays
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping continues and the piles are getting bigger - in alleyway, 18th September
item.description:
Fly tipping in the alleyway since 2023 - the council has never fully cleared this area and people keep damping things there. There are large numbers of rats now and it is getting worse every week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rothsay Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree outside 59/61 chaffinch road BR3 4LX, 18th September
item.description:
Overhanging tree onto driveway, dropping items (including branches) has damaged personal vehicle (cosmetic). Requires pruning, insurance claim to follow.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chaffinch Road, New Beckenham, London

item.title: Various lots of rubbish, 18th September
item.description:
Halfway down Frognal Ave, there is a mattress dumped on the footway by a low wall, a little further on there is a toilet on the footway and opposite B&Q car park there is a pile of pallets in the undergrowth
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Watery Lane, London

item.title: Bottom of Buckwheat Court missing & leaking, 18th September
item.description:

item.title: C21 bike path is blocked by the shown car seemingly permanently, 18th September
item.description:
C21 is blocked by this vehicle making it hard to squeeze and almost impossible when you carry shopping. It is there from the 31st of August and it does not seem to be moving.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Street, Edmonton, London
